title: Shattered (2007) aka
description:
A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot. 

This is a brilliant movie, as well as good performance by Pierce Brosnan

Ripped by SAOS:
Took almost 4.5 hours to compress the video stream
Almost original quality of audio has been preserved, audio compressed by apple itunes

Source:
ESiRM

Provided mp4 is Windows Media Player compatible:
Hence, it will not require any extra plugin to render the video or caption for wmp with VISTA or later releases.

For other players, you can use the srt file to display caption.
